heisig_chinese_memo: A white ray is a drop of sun.
heisig_story: The color white is a mixture of all the primary colors, both for pigments and for light, as we see when a prism breaks up the rays of the sun. Hence, a single drop of sun spells white.
koohiiStory1: A white ray is a drop of sun.
koohiiStory2: Even a small drop (Â´) of the sun (æ—¥) would make you see nothing but white.

WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine two teams (black and white), wearing their team colors, working really hard on hacking the iPhone. The colors are important, and the excitement of the winner holding up the hacked iPhone is too.

humanum_full_description_en:
A golden inscription in the shape of a thumb (Guo Moruo), under the guise of white " white ". The thumb is the first of the fingers, so the ancient word " white " can be extended to mean the " Bo " of the uncle , which means the first among the brothers and the oldest. By extension, those in power with high status can also be called " Bo ", as in Houb's " Bo ".

Oracle is used as place name. It also means the leader and the ruler of the Fang Kingdom, "Compilation" 36511: "Duobai (Bo) Zheng (Zheng) Yu Fang Bai (Bo) Yan", " Yan " is the name of the leader of the Yufang, which means that the monarch of many countries conquered Yu Kingdom Jun Yan. It also means white, "Collection" 30022: "White Sheep". "Collection" 9177: "White Horse". There is a record in the ancient books that the people of Yin advocating white ("Book of Rites-Tan Gong Shang"). It is also borrowed as the numeral " hundred ", "Heji" 1039: "å° (ç‡) Bai (hundred) people", which means that one hundred human sacrifices are used for a singe sacrifice.

The inscription means white, and the book is generous with a tripod: "Public rewards for the book of the big white horse". "Composer" is a historian. Yongzhong: "Platinum Ten Uniforms (jun)", thirty catties equals one Jun, meaning three hundred catties of silver. "Said Wen": "Silver, platinum." It also said that the brothers and sisters ranked first, Wang Bo Jiang Li: "Wang Bai (Bo) Jiang Zha (made) Zun Li." "Wang Bo Jiang" is married to the King of Zhou The concubine's eldest daughter named Jiang. The whole sentence means that the eldest daughter of Zhou Wangfei Jiang casts the food utensils used for sacrifice. It is also read as " Bo ", which means the leader, and the big ding: "The corpse Wangchen is ten and three white (Bo)." It means thirteen supervisors and leaders. It also means Jue, etc., and Cao Ding: "Jing (Xing) Bai (Bo) enters the right Cao, and stands in the court." It means that Bo Xing comes in and assists Cao, standing in the middle of the court.

The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period are called " Hundred ", "Guodian Slips. "Qing Da Yishi" Jane 8: "Bai (bai) li turns to five sheep", "Bai li" means Bai li Xi, ancient books record that Bai Li Xi was bought from Chu State by Qin Mu Gong and five sheepskins. Also known as " Bai ", "Shangbo Zhushu I." Confucius Poems" Jian 26: "Bei (Bei) Bai (Bo) Zhou", which is the handed down version of "Poetry. Bei Feng. The title of a poem in Bai Zhou. It also means white, "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. Eighteen Kinds of Laws of the Qin Dynasty" Jane 34: "Don't be yellow, white, and blue." "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. The 157th back of the Japanese Book A Type: "Fat Pork, Sake, Whitening Liang". "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. Japanese Book No. 174: "White". Mawangdui bamboo slips also indicate white, "Mawangdui. "He Yin Yang" Jian 132: "Nasal sweat and white lips" means that the nose is sweaty and the lips are white.

Gao Hongjin, Chen Shihui, Zhao Cheng, Yao Xiaosui believed that " white " resembled the shape of a human face or a human head. Later, " person " was added to it as a sign. It was the original text of "çšƒ". The Warring States and Qin characters added " "è±¸" is " look ". The ancient word " white " is pronounced " bo ", which means that the chief, the head, and the head of state are derived from the meaning of the head. Yao Xiaosui even pointed out that the engraved words on human skulls are written " white ", which can be used as evidence. Gu Bei said.

"Said Wen": "White, Western color. Yin is used to find white. From entering into two, two, Yin number. All white belongs to white. ğ¦£º, ancient text is white."
